name: Dratini
flavorText:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.

previous.name: Moltres
previous.flavorText:
Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.

next.name: Dragonair
next.flavorText:
A mystical POKéMON
that exudes a
gentle aura. Has the ability
to change climate
conditions.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.flavorText:
An extremely
rarely seen
marine POKéMON. Its intelligence
is said to match
that of humans.
